articles.title: KPF unveils plans for Old Street skyscraper - Architect's Journal
articles.description: Kohn Pedersen Fox Associates (KPF) has unveiled early plans for a 160m office tower by Old Street roundabout in east London
articles.content: The site at 99 City Road is currently occupied by a 10-storey postmodern office block developed in the late 1980s as headquarters for satellite telecommunications company Inmarsat. However, Inmarsat … [+1485 chars]
